titles.title: Higeki no Genkyou to Naru Saikyou Gedou Last Boss Joou wa Tami no Tame ni Tsukushimasu.
The Most Heretical Last Boss Queen Who Will Become the Source of Tragedy Will Devote Herself for the Sake of the People
悲劇の元凶となる最強外道ラスボス女王は民の為に尽くします。
The Most Heretical Last Boss Queen: From Villainess to Savior

title: Higeki no Genkyou to Naru Saikyou Gedou Last Boss Joou wa Tami no Tame ni Tsukushimasu.
title_english: The Most Heretical Last Boss Queen: From Villainess to Savior
title_japanese: 悲劇の元凶となる最強外道ラスボス女王は民の為に尽くします。
title_synonyms: The Most Heretical Last Boss Queen Who Will Become the Source of Tragedy Will Devote Herself for the Sake of the People
synopsis:
Pride Royal Ivy is the final boss and all-around scum in the otome game Our Ray of Light. She committed innumerable crimes—from enslaving her adopted brother in a soul-binding contract to abusing her position against the servants in the household. In short, she is a villain of pure evil.

A normal high school student in Japan reincarnates into the eight-year-old body of Princess Pride. The first order of business: survive to see another day. Using her cheat-like abilities, she resolves to save her father, rescue the kingdom, and become a kind and benevolent ruler. And so, Pride resolves to change her fate, no matter what it takes!

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
background: Higeki no Genkyou to Naru Saikyou Gedou Last Boss Joou wa Tami no Tame ni Tsukushimasu. was published in English as The Most Heretical Last Boss Queen: From Villainess to Savior by Seven Seas Entertainment from April 5, 2022 to February 14, 2023. The series was discontinued due to the artist's poor health on October 25, 2022, following an announcement from the publisher.
